item.description:
Salsa style Ballroom music/dancing at the Turks Head building, about a 3 block walk from the meeting point, more info at http://www.waterfire.....

The lessons start at 7, dancing after 8 and Waterfire lighting should begin at 7:44 according to the website. Meet on the Steeple Street side of One Citizens Plaza and we can determine what order to see what Providence has to offer for the evening.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the tall guy with glasses and blue, short-sleeve button down shirt
item.name: Salsa and Waterfire in Downtown Providecne
